attributes.action: Give equal rights to Fathers with respect to the care and upbringing of their children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This government is accelerating the decline of the role of the father in the care of their children.

I believe that fathers have an equal role to play. Please join me by signing this petition to campaign for equality of rights for Fathers with respect to access, care and upbringing of their children.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Give equal rights to Fathers with respect to the care and upbringing of their children."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
